label: 内宴
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Held around the 21st day of the first month at the Jijuden; attended by the emperor and members of the court, including all the literati. Instituted by the Sinophile Emperor Saga in the ninth century, it had as its central feature the composition of poems in Chinese on assigned topics. It did not survive the Heian period. [嵯峨天皇　平安時代]
